announcements.title: General Motors & Intro to Game Dev
announcements.description: General Motors will be giving a careers presentation answering common student questions. Later, our workshops officers will be presenting an 'Intro to Game Dev' presentation and show you how to make a simple game of your own!

announcements.title: HCSS & Intro to Mobile Dev
announcements.description: First a construction software company called HCSS will be giving a presentation. Later, our workshops team will be presenting 'Intro to Mobile Dev' where we will build a simple, cross-platform app using Flutter!

announcements.title: Credera & API Treasure Hunt with DSC
announcements.description: First we will have a former officer, Thomas McDonald, give a presentation for Credera, a technology consulting company! Then, we will be hosting a joint workshop presentation with the Google Developer Student Club! The topic is 'Consuming API's', which will be followed up by a treasure hunt!

announcements.title: Checkmarx Competition & Intro to Web Dev
announcements.description: Checkmarx, a software security company, will be introducing themselves, and also announcing a competition! Then, our Workshops team will be presenting an 'Intro to Web Development' presentation. Whether you've built tons of websites before or have never touched HTML in your life, this workshop probably has something for you.

announcements.title: Capsher Competition & CS Careers Officer Panel
announcements.description: Capsher Technology, a local company, will be presenting our last semester long competition! Later our Workshops team will be presenting on CS Careers with an officer AMA panel. If you have any questions for our officers about their experience so far in industry, tonight's the night!

announcements.title: Project Member Sign-ups
announcements.description: Liked a project you saw at our meeting on 09/14? Did you know that you can join and contribute to it? The sign-up link is below, apply right away! Make sure to open with your tamu email.

announcements.title: General Motors and Project Presentations
announcements.description: Hear from one of our former presidents, Rohit Mucherla, who will be representing General Motors, presenting a competition and providing some info on a topic which will help you make an entry! Later, learn from the projects team about all the amazing projects we have lined up for this semester.

announcements.title: Internship Advice & Intro to Git
announcements.description: Come and watch Dr. Aakash Tyagi's presentation 'Internship: Ready... Get Set Go!' and get some amazing career advice. Later, learn from our Workshops officers about how to use git, and kickstart your journey with GitHub!

announcements.title: Project Management Interest Form
announcements.description: ACC projects are teams lead by project managers to learn or create a product! Project managers are expected to write code, while also leading and teaching the team throughout the semester. Get your app in before 11:59pm on the day of the deadline.

announcements.title: Fall Semester Kickoff
announcements.description: Learn about all the awesome stuff we have planned this semester: multiple competitions, cool workshops, and maybe even some social events! Hear from Pariveda Solutions about a competition they will be sponsoring this semester, and to close off, get to interact with our Workshops team!

announcements.title: ACC Recap
announcements.description: We'd love to hear some feedback centered on how projects went this past semester. You can access the survey through the link below. We want to assure you that no matter what A&M decides, we'll have ACC up and running again next semester.

announcements.title: ACC Update
announcements.description: All Aggie Coding Club meetings are cancelled for the rest of this semester. We will miss seeing y'all on Monday nights! In addition, after discussing with Capsher, the CAPSHER Show and Tell competition has also been cancelled.

announcements.title: APIs @ ACC + AWICS
announcements.description: We have a second event going on this week. Our workshops chairs are partnering with AWiCS to bring you a special workshop over APIs this Tuesday from 7pm to 8pm in HRBB 113. Food will be provided!

announcements.title: CAPSHER Show and Tell with Huge Prizes
announcements.description: We are looking for you to submit any side project you may have been working on in the past year for judging by industry experts from CAPSHER Technology. To enter the contest, drop your submission into the following shared drive!

announcements.title: Board Game Night
announcements.description: Bring your favorite game if you would like to share with others, but games and snacks will be provided too!

announcements.title: Data Science & Free Food with General Motors
announcements.description: One of our former presidents, Rohit Mucherla, will be visiting the club with his employer, General Motors. They have planned an interactive data science activity for you and will also be bringing dinner. We will also have a short hands-on API activity at 8:30pm.

announcements.title: Internship Advice from Dr. Tyagi
announcements.description: Dr. Aakash Tyagi will be giving a talk titled 'Internship...Ready...Get Set GO'. He has worked in industry for years, and is uniquely equipped to discuss his experiences working with students. Later, our workshops chairs will be giving a workshop on Consuming and Understanding APIs.

announcements.title: Accessibility in Coding
announcements.description: Justin Romack, Assistive Tech Coordinator with Disability Resources, will share his perspective as a totally blind professional working in the accessible technologies field. Later, we'll have a brief workshop on Developing an Accessible Website.

announcements.title: Project Sign Ups
announcements.description: Project sign ups are out! Please provide your top 3 preferences in order of preference! Use the link below to sign up for your favourite project!

announcements.title: Project Presentations
announcements.description: Hear from the project managers who will be hosting projects that you have the opportunity to join! You will get the chance to hear from each project manager, and then stay after and ask questions to get to know them. There will be NO workshop.

announcements.title: Project Management Interest Form
announcements.description: Project manager applications are currently open. They will remain open until midnight tonight, so get those applications in!

announcements.title: Informational Meeting
announcements.description: Get to know about all the awesome things we will be doing this semester, including a Show and Tell with huge prizes, our second annual Smash competition, and much more! Later, learn from a workshop about project management.

announcements.title: Capital One Food and Fireside Chat
announcements.description: Michael McKenna is our former President. Meeting is intended for you to get to know Michael, eat yummy food, and learn about Capital One.
